target_compile_definitions(${THIS_PROJECT} INTERFACE "USE_SCHEMATYC_LEGACY_CORE")

target_include_directories( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CryAction" )
